name: CVE-2017-8696
description: Windows Uniscribe in Microsoft Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1; Windows 7 SP1; Office 2007 SP3; Office 2010 SP2; Word Viewer; Office for Mac 2011 and 2016; Skype for Business 2016; Lync 2013 SP1; Lync 2010; Lync 2010 Attendee; and Live Meeting 2007 Add-in and Console allows an attacker to execute code remotely via a specially crafted website or a specially crafted document or email attachment, aka "Microsoft Graphics Component Remote Code Execution."
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:office_2010:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:live_meeting:2007:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:lync:2010:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:lync:2010:*:attendee:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:*:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:office_web_apps:2010:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:lync:2013:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:office_word_viewer:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:office_2007:-:sp3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:r2:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:skype_for_business:2016:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
